auto-10: Defeat 10 wild Pokémon using Auto Battle!
pickup-10: Pick up items on the ground 10 times!
sneak-up: Successfully sneak up on 1 Pokémon and surprise them with a battle!
photo-fly: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon in flight!
photo-swim: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon that is swimming!
photo-canyon: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon in the Canyon Biome!
photo-coastal: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon in the Coastal Biome!
photo-polar: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon in the Polar Biome!
photo-savanna: Take a photo of a wild Pokémon in the Savanna Biome!
tera-self-defeat: Terastallize your Pokémon to defeat a wild Pokémon!
wash-pokemon: Give your Pokémon a nice washing!
auto-30: Defeat 30 wild Pokémon using Auto Battle!
tera-raid: Claim victory in a Tera Raid Battle!
sandwich-three: Make a sandwich that uses at least 3 ingredients!
photo-normal: Take a photo of a wild Normal-type Pokémon!
photo-fighting: Take a photo of a wild Fighting-type Pokémon!
photo-flying: Take a photo of a wild Flying-type Pokémon!
photo-poison: Take a photo of a wild Poison-type Pokémon!
photo-ground: Take a photo of a wild Ground-type Pokémon!

photo-bug: Take a photo of a wild Bug-type Pokémon!
photo-ghost: Take a photo of a wild Ghost-type Pokémon!
photo-steel: Take a photo of a wild Steel-type Pokémon!
photo-fire: Take a photo of a wild Fire-type Pokémon!
photo-water: Take a photo of a wild Water-type Pokémon!
photo-grass: Take a photo of a wild Grass-type Pokémon!
photo-electric: Take a photo of a wild Electric-type Pokémon!
photo-psychic: Take a photo of a wild Psychic-type Pokémon!
photo-ice: Take a photo of a wild Ice-type Pokémon!
photo-dragon: Take a photo of a wild Dragon-type Pokémon!
photo-dark: Take a photo of a wild Dark-type Pokémon!
photo-fairy: Take a photo of a wild Fairy-type Pokémon!
ditto-central: Find Ditto Blocks in the Central Plaza!
ditto-savanna: Find Ditto Blocks in the Savanna Biome!
ditto-coastal: Find Ditto Blocks in the Coastal Biome!
ditto-canyon: Find Ditto Blocks in the Canyon Biome!
ditto-polar: Find Ditto Blocks in the Polar Biome!
group-savanna: Take a photo with your friends in the Savanna Biome!
group-coastal: Take a photo with your friends in the Coastal Biome!
group-canyon: Take a photo with your friends in the Canyon Biome!
group-polar: Take a photo with your friends in the Polar Biome!
group-eyewear: Take a photo with your friends while everyone's wearing eyewear!
group-nonuniform: Take a photo with your friends wearing something other than school uniforms!
group-masks: Take a photo with your friends while everyone's wearing masks!
sandwich-four: Make a four-star sandwich with your friends!
catch-hint: Catch the Pokémon that matches the hints you've been given!
catch-hint2: Catch the Pokémon that matches the limited hints you've been given!
